techmeme.title: How some people are using the term "slop" as a descriptor for low-grade AI material, after emerging in reaction to the release of AI art generators in 2022 (Benjamin Hoffman/New York Times)

China's Ministry of Commerce issues a policy for expanding the nation's cross-border e-commerce industry and to promote the construction of offshore warehouses (Simon Sharwood/The Register)
In an interview, OpenAI CTO Mira Murati responded to Elon Musk's denouncement of Apple's OpenAI deal, saying OpenAI cares deeply about user privacy and security (Verne Kopytoff/Fortune)
X says the platform will make Likes private for everyone this week, meaning users will no longer be able to see who liked someone else's post (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
